title: glitched mouse on only one account
body:
hello so im experiencing this bug where i cant click on minimap like it doesnt move screen and also i cant click on people to see their items and stuff and this happens on only one account what can i do? can riot fix my acc or how can i tell them to
tl;dr mouse glitched on only one acc tried resetting to default and repairing client wont help

replies.body:
It sounds like the input settings on this one account are completely goofed. Resetting these settings can be done with the steps below:

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

>Delete these two files:
>- **input.ini**
>- **PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, leave the custom match, then hop into another one to confirm everything was fixed.

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.
omg thank u u dont know how much u helped me <3
